DOC.brief_title: Biological Standardization Chenopodium Album Allergen Extract
DOC.detailed_description: This open , unblinded non-randomized biological assay . The study design slight modification recommendation propose Nordic Guidelines . Four concentration Chenopodium album allergen extract , together positive negative control , use 10 mg/ml histamine dihydrochloride solution glycerinated phenol saline solution , respectively , test every patient duplicate volar surface forearm .
